body_html:
Thx man!
It's executed in my mac OS with py 3.6.5 and tf 1.3.0.
To reproduce, you should have a directory we call file_path of such structure below:
0 -- img1.jpg
img2.jpg
img3.jpg
...
1 -- img1.jpg
img2.jpg
...
2 -- ...
And encode_tfrecords'll return a tfrecords file.
Then you can use read_and_decode function to decode the tfrecords and see the pics.

body:
Thx man!
It's executed in my mac OS with py 3.6.5 and tf 1.3.0. 
To reproduce, you should have a directory we call file_path of such structure below:
0 -- img1.jpg
     img2.jpg
     img3.jpg
     ...
1 -- img1.jpg
     img2.jpg
     ...
2 -- ...
And encode_tfrecords'll return a tfrecords file.
Then you can use read_and_decode function to decode the tfrecords and see the pics.
